ARABIC: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They are all my enemies - except for the Lord of all the worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they are my enemies except the Lord of all the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They are all enemies to me; all, except the Lord of the Universe
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: are my enemies? Not so the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “They are all my enemies, except the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they are enemies to me, save the Lord of Al-`Alamin,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they are enemies to me, but not (so) the Lord of the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They are an enemy to me, except the Lord of all Being
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! they are (all) an enemy unto me, save the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they are all my enemies, not so the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily they are an enemy unto me, save the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are indeed enemies to me, but the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For they are enemies to me; not so the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! They are enemies to me, save the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They are enemies to me except the Lord of all the Worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They are enemies to me, but not so the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:77] They are indeed hateful to me, I do not worship them; but the Lord of the Worlds, I do worship Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! they are (all) an enemy unto me) and I disassociate myself from them, (save the Lord of the Worlds) except the worship of the Lord of the Worlds.
